comment: /**  * @return The HTTP method of the incoming request  */
code: /**  * @return The HTTP method of the incoming request  */ public String getMethod() {     return method. }

comment: /**  * @return The URI of the incoming request  */
code: /**  * @return The URI of the incoming request  */ public URI getUri() {     return uri. }

comment: /**  * @return The specific value of a request header, null if it does not exist  */
code: /**  * @return The specific value of a request header, null if it does not exist  */ public String getHeader(String name) {     return headers.getFirst(name). }

comment: /**  * @return All headers associated with this request  */
code: /**  * @return All headers associated with this request  */ public Headers getHeaders() {     return headers. }

comment: /**  * @return The body the incoming request had, null if no body was found  */
code: /**  * @return The body the incoming request had, null if no body was found  */ public String getBody() {     return body. }
@Override public String toString() {     return String.format(Locale.ROOT, "%s %s", method, uri). }

comment: /**  * @param body Sets the body of the incoming request  */
code: /**  * @param body Sets the body of the incoming request  */ void setBody(String body) {     this.body = body. }
